statements: SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_id = 1;
SELECT output_text, input_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT training_id, input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data ORDER BY training_timestamp DESC;
SELECT training_id, input_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE output_text IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_id = 1;
SELECT input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_id > 5;
SELECT training_id, input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE training_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY training_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE input_text LIKE '%question%' AND output_text LIKE '%answer%';
SELECT training_id, input_text, output_text FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE input_text IN ('hello', 'hi') ORDER BY training_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT user_id, question, answer, timestamp FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT answer, user_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_training_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, question FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM chatbot_metadata WHERE deployment_status = true;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT user_id, question, answer FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE timestamp > NOW();
SELECT question, answer FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE question LIKE '%weather%';
SELECT user_id FROM chatbot_training_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT model_version, accuracy FROM chatbot_metadata WHERE accuracy >= 0.9;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE intent = 'greeting';
SELECT message_text, entity FROM training_data ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, confidence FROM bot_responses WHERE intent = 'question' ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, response_id FROM conversation_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT message_id, intent FROM training_data WHERE entity IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE intent = 'Greetings';
SELECT message_text, entity FROM training_data WHERE message_id < 100 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, confidence FROM bot_responses WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT log_id, message_id, response_id, timestamp FROM conversation_logs WHERE conversation_id = 12345 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT intent, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM bot_responses GROUP BY intent HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data;
SELECT question, answer FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE category='Technical';
SELECT id, category FROM chatbot_training_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT MAX(accuracy) FROM training_logs;
SELECT model_name, version FROM deployed_models WHERE active=true;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE category = 'General' LIMIT 10;
SELECT question, answer FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE category = 'FAQ' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, question FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, answer FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE question LIKE '%weather%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, question, answer FROM chatbot_training_data WHERE category = 'Technical' AND created_at < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM training_data WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT intent_id, intent_name, related_intents FROM intent_mapping ORDER BY intent_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, last_login FROM user_profiles WHERE total_messages_sent > 100 ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT model_id, accuracy FROM model_performance WHERE accuracy >= 0.9;
SELECT message_id, message_text, intent FROM training_data WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY message_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM user_profiles WHERE total_messages_sent >= 100 ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT intent_name, related_intents FROM intent_mapping WHERE intent_name = 'Greeting' ORDER BY intent_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, message_id, feedback_score FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_score > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_id, timestamp, accuracy FROM model_performance WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
